title: Unisex Oversized Hoodie – Comfy Everyday Essential
body_html:
Wrap yourself in comfort with this dropped-shoulder hoodie — the perfect blend of fashion and function. Designed for both men and women, this oversized pullover features a soft polyester fabric, roomy fit, and cozy hood for effortless style. Whether you're lounging or heading out, it's your go-to for all-day comfort and a relaxed look.

✅ Unisex design with a trendy oversized fit 

✅ Soft, breathable polyester for maximum comfort 

✅ Large patch pocket to keep your hands warm 

✅ Available in versatile colors like black, navy, and khaki 

✅ Great for casual wear, workouts, or layering
